title: A few more T206's (Remaining cards are going to ebay this evening, thanks to all)
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: A few more T206's (Remaining cards are going to ebay this evening, thanks to all)
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I am trying to clean up the mess left behind from an impulse buy.  Thanks to all that have helped me find new homes for 75 or so cards over the past two weeks.  

Feel free to make offers on groups of cards or the page (I like selling lots of stuff at once!).

Graded:
McGraw Glove SC 350-460, 42 $75  SOLDDD
Dahlen Brooklyn P350 SGC 20 $105

American Beauty Graded Cards (also one in the raw section):
Nick Maddox AB 350 Framed PSA 2 $55
Red Murray AB 350 Framed SGC 10 $45
Russ Ford AB 460 SGC 10 $ 55
Hooks Wiltse AB 350 NO Frame SGC 10 $55

Raw Cards
Donlin Bat SC 350-460 Factory 25 GD+ $22
Malarkey AB 350 Frame GD+-VG-, one good crease, super color $75
Lavender Carolina Brights VG-, surface wear, no crease super clean back $250
Shag Shaughnessy Old Mill GOOD $185  SOLDDDD
Stark P350 VG-VGEX $95  SOLDDDD
Cranston Old Mill VG- $75
Thebo P350 VG $85
 

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

You are first J.  Drop me an email and I'll get you lined out.
Thanks,
Bob

posts.post_title: Bump for additions and price drops
posts.post_content:
Really looking to sell these cards!
Thanks to all of the buyers so far.
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
Nice cards, Bob.  If they were Cardinals I'd be all over them. :)
